file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-40-07-06 - EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I PRESSURE BULKHEAD PRESSURIZED AREA - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I PRESSURE BULKHEAD PRESSURIZED AREA - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the EWIS components, located in rear fuselage I, pressure bulkhead area, for general condition. B. Related Zones: 275/276. C. Zone Boundaries ( AMM MPP 06-41-00/100 AMM MPP 06-41-00/100). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FU- SELAGE I (PRESSURE BULKHEAD PRES- ALL 05-40-07-200-801-A ♦ SURIZED AREA) - INTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-40-07 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-40-07-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I (PRESSURE BULKHEAD PRESSURIZED AREA) - INTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This procedure obeys the EWIS ICA requirement. (2) This task gives the instructions to do SMRD Task Number: 20-00-00-212-007-A00. (3) You must do the internal general visual inspection (GVI) of rear fuselage I, at zones 275/276, within a touching distance from the APU power cables, and wiring bundles. (4) The function of the internal general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that you can easily see. (5) Do not unlace or displace the electrical wiring and components, during the inspections. (6) Refer to the Preparation subtask for access panel information. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400 - REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT FLOOR PAN- AMM TASK 53-01-04-000-801-A/400 ELS - REMOVAL REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT FLOOR PAN- AMM TASK 53-01-04-400-801-A/400 ELS - INSTALLATION WM 20-22-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Baggage compartment and rear elec- 271 - tronic compartment - LH Baggage compartment and rear elec- 272 - tronic compartment - RH Pressure bulkhead - baggage compart- 275 - ment - LH side Pressure bulkhead - baggage compart- 276 - ment - RH side Floor panel - rear electronic compart- 271 271EF ment EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-40-07 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (Continued) ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section I - RH D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Flashlight To make the inspection of the area easier Standard Ladder To get access to the area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear fuselage I - pressure bulkhead I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder into position. (2) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) to get access to the rear electronic compartment. (3) Remove rear-electronic-compartment floor panel 271EF (AMM TASK 53-01-04-000-801-A/400). (4) Remove, if necessary, the thermoacoustic insulation from rear fuselage I, at zones 171/275/276 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802- A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400, as applicable). J. EWIS Components in the Rear Fuselage I (Pressure Bulkhead Pressurized Area) - Internal General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Do a general visual inspection on the APU power cables, wiring bundles, and connected EWIS at Rear Fuselage I, lower side, for signs of damage, correct installation, chafing and general condition. Refer to WM 20-22-00. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-40-07 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) If you removed the thermoacoustic insulation, install it back in zones 171/275/276 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400), as applicable. (2) Install rear-electronic-compartment floor panel 271EF (AMM TASK 53-01-04-400-801- A/400). (3) Install access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (4) Remove the ladder.
